EmailTemplate.name: International Account Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
At this time, YETI does not allow international account creation. Please place an order as a guest once you have selected your country on our site.
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
